name: PricingCardOne
description: Pricing card with badge, price, subtitle, and feature list with checkmarks.

description.example: Select the perfect plan for your needs

badge.note: Required for visual consistency across all cards

subtitle.note: Required for visual consistency across all cards

features.note: Array of feature strings, required for visual consistency

badgeIcon.note: Optional Lucide icon to display next to badge

propsSchema.plans: Array<{ id: string, badge: string, badgeIcon?: LucideIcon, price: string, subtitle: string, features: string[] }>
propsSchema.animationType: 'none' | 'opacity' | 'slide-up' | 'scale-rotate' | 'blur-reveal' | 'depth-3d' (required - controls GSAP scroll animations with stagger effect)
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)

usageExample: <PricingCardOne plans={[{ id: '1', badge: 'Most Popular', price: '$29/mo', subtitle: 'Perfect for small teams', features: ['Up to 10 team members', '100GB storage', 'Priority support'] }]} title="Choose Your Plan" description="Find the perfect plan for your needs" textboxLayout="default" animationType="slide-up" useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} />
